product.heading: I found Kim Kardashian's Missing Purse! Selling Items:

product.name: Kim Kardashian Signature Leather Tote Bag
product.description: Kim's go-to signature leather tote, featuring a timeless design with gold-plated hardware. The spacious interior is lined with silk and includes multiple compartments for organization.

product.name: Diamond-Encrusted Lip Gloss Compact
product.description: A luxurious lip gloss compact with a dazzling diamond-encrusted exterior. The gloss inside is a high-shine, non-sticky formula perfect for achieving Kim's signature pout.

product.name: Limited Edition Perfume Pen
product.description: A sleek, gold-plated perfume pen containing Kim's exclusive limited edition fragrance. The pen dispenses the perfect amount of the sultry scent, ideal for on-the-go touch-ups.

product.name: Designer Sunglasses with Swarovski Crystals
product.description: Oversized sunglasses from a top designer brand adorned with Swarovski crystals. These statement shades provide both style and maximum UV protection.

product.name: Custom Monogrammed Silk Face Mask
product.description: A silk face mask personalized with Kim's initials. The fashionable and protetive accessory adds a touch of elegance to any ensemble.

product.name: 24K Gold-Infused Phone Charger
product.description: A high-end phone charger featuring 24K gold accents. This tech accessory not only keeps your phone powered up but does so in style.

product.name: Crystal-Embellished Hair Clips Set
product.description: A set of three hair clips featuring intricate crystal embellishments. These clips add a touch of glamour to any hairstyle, as seen on Kim herself.

product.name: Gold-plated Selfie Ring Light
product.description: A portable, gold-plated ring light designed for capturing the perfect selfie in any lighting. The adjustable brightness ensures flawless photos every time.
